source_objects.title: 3D & Animation
source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: 3D Studio Max Foundation
items.headline: Learn key modelling techniques & create a colourful 3D cartoon scene
objectives_summary: Learn key modelling techniques such as Edit Poly, Splines and FFD to create basic 3D Models
Use the Slate Material Editor to create and apply colours
Block out and create your own stylised house and props

items.title: After Effect 2021 for Beginners
items.headline: Become A Pro in After Effects in Project Based Learning
objectives_summary: Starting from beginner to finalizing a complete project
Base on Practise and Project Base
Parenting

items.title: Siemens NX (V1926 & Higher) for Beginners within a week
items.headline: Modeling, Drafting, Assembly, Animation Designer, Synchronous Modeling
objectives_summary: Modeling,Drafting,Assembly Modules plus
Synchoronous Modeling , Animation Designer Modules
with engaging videos

items.title: Low Poly Modeling - Learn Low-Poly 3D Modeling & Texturing
items.headline: How to Create Low-Poly 3D Model & Texture for Games in Maya and export for Game Engine & Isometric game tutorial
objectives_summary: create 3D LowPoly Game model from start to finish.
create game assets, Optimization for games, Unwrapping UVs, Texturing in Photoshop, Rendering in Maya
use quick & easy tools/techniques of 3D modeling and texturing

items.title: ZBrush and Photoshop Course on Hard Surface modelling
items.headline: Learn to Create amazing hard surfaces in ZBrush and Photoshop great for beginners to master the tools needed to create
objectives_summary: Confidence in using ZBrush
Have a great understanding of the ZRemodeller tool
Understand Doc size and Custom views

items.title: Introduction to 3D Studio Max
items.headline: Your first steps into 3D modeling
objectives_summary: Create 3d models ready for use in games and video

items.title: Wheel-Thrown Pottery II, Intermediate Skill Builders
items.headline: Creating Pottery
objectives_summary: Understanding of intermediate technical processes, concepts and practices of pottery wheel based art.

items.title: Create Energy Effects Trapcode Particular in After Effects
items.headline: Particles Energy
objectives_summary: Trapcode Particular

items.title: Hard Surface Creature Creation in Zbrush | Intermediate User
items.headline: Improve your hard surface creature sculpting and create stunning sci fi, robotic, hard surface creatures using Zbrush.
objectives_summary: Hard surface mechanical part
Designing Creatures with hard surface and organic elements
Creating Armor

items.title: Real life complex materials for UE
items.headline: Learn what is behind of cool materials looking inside unreal engine, understand deeply your maths
objectives_summary: Create real life examples of materials that your will use during your career
Not only create cool materials in unreal engine, but understand them
Learn the techniques and the right mind set when making materials

items.title: After Effects Infographics Animation | Motion Graphics
items.headline: Adobe After Effects Infographic Tutorial, Adobe After Effect Data Visualization, After Effects Motion Graphic Tutorial
objectives_summary: Create Animated infographics, Bar Charts and Pie Charts
Make after effects template for marketplace
Design infographics with After Effects

items.title: SOLIDWORKS Tutorial
items.headline: by SOLIDWORKS partners
objectives_summary: fundamentals of 3D modelling.
Designing with SolidWORKS Features
Sketching in Solidowrks

items.title: Building Reusable Character Actions in Moho Pro 13
items.headline: Create reusable walk cycles, poses and more for any Moho character rig!
objectives_summary: How to use the Actions panel
Build step based actions which can be linked with others
Learn how to create walk cycles and other character animations

items.title: Dragon Concept in Zbrush
items.headline: Step by step course for creature sculpting in Zbrush and Photoshop
objectives_summary: Creature concept sculpting in Zbrush.
Blocking out the basic shapes.
Detailing and using alphas.

items.title: PolyModeling in Houdini
items.headline: Learn modeling in the best VFX software
objectives_summary: Polymodeling in Houdini

items.title: Learn How to Create a Cartoon Bird in zBrush
items.headline: Step by Step Training to Creating Fun Cartoon Characters in zBrush!
objectives_summary: Create Your Own Fun 3D Cartoon Characters
Learn Amazing Sculpting Techniques
Learn to Use Dynamesh and zSpheres Together
